TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UrlIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class UrlIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: Defines the identity permission for the URL from which the code originates.

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the URL from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被视为完整的 URL，包括协议 （HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP） 和文件。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file. 例如，http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是完整 URL。For example, http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a complete URL. Url 可以匹配严格或使用通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*. Url 还可以包含通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，在 URL 名称字符串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/是 http:// 的子集\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效的这是调用程序集是完全受信任时如此。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 也就是说，要求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. > [!NOTE] > 在之前的.NET framework 的版本[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，你可以使用方法，以防止对系统资源的受信任的代码的意外访问。In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code. 现已过时，并对资源的访问现在只能由程序集的授予权限来决定。 is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly. 若要限制对文件的访问，必须在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码，并将其分配仅对允许代码访问的资源的权限。To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`权限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，标识权限不能有权限状态值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限可以具有任何权限状态值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 这意味着，在 2.0 及更高版本中，标识权限具有相同的行为实现的权限接口。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是说，要求的标识始终成功，而不考虑程序集，标识程序集已被授予完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 从.NET Framework 2.0 版开始，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CPP/urlidentity.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CS/urlidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/VB/urlidentity.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 都视为完整的 URL，包括协议 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和该文件，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. Url 可以匹配严格或使用通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*. Url 还可以包含通配符 ("\*") 在点分隔符处的前缀。URLs can also contain a wildcard ("\*") prefix at the dot delimiter. 例如，在 URL 名称字符串http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/是 http:// 的子集\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ 和 http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/。For example, the URL name string http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ is a subset of http://\*.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/ and http://\*.com/process/grind.htm/. > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 版中，出于性能原因，一个无效的 URL 不会导致创建新的类实例时出现参数异常。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, for performance reasons, an invalid URL does not cause an argument exception at the time the new class instance is created. 集运算 （Union、 Intersect 或 IsSubsetOf） 之一执行时，将出现参数异常。The argument exception will occur when one of the set operations (Union, Intersect, or IsSubsetOf) is executed. 有关权限原因需由安全基础结构调用。A demand on the permission causes to be called by the security infrastructure. 该请求将失败由于出现参数异常，导致引发。The demand will fail because of the argument exception, resulting in a being thrown. 在此情况下，原始异常不会被发现。In this case, the original exception will not be seen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用构造函数。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CPP/urlidentity.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/CS/urlidentity.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UrlIdentityPermission/VB/urlidentity.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与原始权限情况下，一份权限表示对资源的相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是介绍访问它们都共同点描述的 Url 的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes access to the URLs they both describe in common. 仅通过两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 例如的交集的权限表示对访问http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm和表示访问的权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\* 是表示对访问权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm。For example, the intersection of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm and a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\* is a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm. 支持 set 操作 (， ，和) 仅当当前权限与指定的权限的对象相等或权限之一时使用通配符运算符 ("\*")。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission object or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*").

exception.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: -or- The Url property is not a valid URL.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限标识到完全包含在指定权限的 URL 的访问，则当前的权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission identifies access to a URL that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对访问的权限http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm是表示对访问权限的子集http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\*。For example, a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm is a subset of a permission that represents access to http://www.fourthcoffee.com/\*. 如果此方法返回`true`，当前的权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 支持 set 操作 (， ，和) 仅当当前权限等同于指定的权限或权限之一时使用通配符运算符 ("\*")。 supports set operations (, , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果方法是表示对由当前的权限，表示 URL 的访问，以及所表示的指定权限的 URL 访问的权限。The result of a call to the method is a permission that represents access to the URL as represented by the current permission, as well as access to the URL as represented by the specified permission. 类支持的集运算， ，和) 仅当当前权限是否等于指定的权限，或当权限之一使用通配符运算符 ("\*") 和一个是的子集其他。The class supports set operations , , and ) only when the current permission is equal to the specified permission, or when one of the permissions uses the wildcard operator ("\*") and one is a subset of the other.

summary.span: Gets or sets a URL representing the identity of Internet code.

span.span: Gets or sets a URL representing the identity of Internet code.

value.span: 表示 Internet 代码的标识的 URL。

span.span: A URL representing the identity of Internet code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 都视为完整的 URL，包括协议 (HTTP、 HTTPS、 FTP) 和该文件，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/。The complete URL is considered, including the protocol (HTTP, HTTPS, FTP) and the file, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/grind.htm/. Url 可以匹配严格或使用通配符在最后一个位置，例如： http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*。URLs can be matched exactly or by a wildcard in the final position, for example: http://www.fourthcoffee.com/process/\*.

exception.span: The URL cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.

span.span: The URL cannot be retrieved because it has an ambiguous identity.
